Dark One/Breakdown/Pyro/Hiss/Scavenger/Nemesis Enforcer:

::A sleek black colored Shuko craft collided into the ground, skidding for a 
few seconds and then stopping::

::Quickly, a hatch shot open, several Cybertronians exiting the vehicle, 
stepping into the stand of what will be named the Gobi Desert, in the nation 
of Mongolia::

"Pthh, Dark One, where are we?" (Asked Pyro)

"I don't know.  Hiss, do you have any idea where we are?"

"No, Dark One.  It is a habitable planet though.  Many different terrains and 
climates all over.  But previous scans detected intelligent life...to the 
north." (Hiss replied, the scientist replied, pointing in the direction he 
spoke of)

"Good, follow me, men!  We will either find employeers, or victims!" (Dark 
One ordered, transforming to his beast mode and 'running', followed by 
everyone else)

====================================

::Nemesis sighed, activating his com::
<Zardus, I am detecting a ship that crash landed in the desert, and five 
energy signatures, shall we go and try and convert them?  If so I strongly 
urge executing Wolfgang so that we don't have to worry>
